definition: need not/unnecessary
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
see 可汗[ke4 han2]
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
(negative prefix)/not/no
certainly/must/will/necessarily

sentences.english: You don't just have to sit in the stands and gape at the exploits of others.
sentences.chinese: 你大可不必坐在看台上，目瞪口呆地盯着别人的战绩。

sentences.english: If you feel guilty about doing this, don’t be.
sentences.chinese: 如果你觉得这么做你会有内疚感，那就大可不必。

sentences.english: If the baby slept soundly, but also need not have to wake him on time feeding.
sentences.chinese: 如果宝宝睡得很香，也大可不必非要弄醒他按时喂奶。

sentences.english: You don't even have to pay for the audio programs.
sentences.chinese: 你大可不必为自己听这些节目付费。

sentences.english: If you disagree with it, you don't have to live in that society where that operates.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不同意，那你大可不必住在如此运行的社会。

sentences.english: But I did not need to go to Switzerland to learn that.
sentences.chinese: 到瑞士要是就为了知道这些就大可不必去了。

sentences.english: Houses need not serve as tinder, Cohen says; they can be built with fire-resistant roof shingles and siding.
sentences.chinese: 科恩称，房子大可不必遭逢火灾。

sentences.english: But one needn't idealize that past;
sentences.chinese: 但人们大可不必把过去的岁月理想化。

sentences.english: The world doesn’t need another gag about a girl with come in her hair.
sentences.chinese: 这个世界大可不必担心剃光头的女孩是诱人的祸水啦。

sentences.english: Solicitude for the future of a race like this is not in order.
sentences.chinese: 要是为这种民族的前途担忧，那是大可不必的了。

sentences.english: But don't believe all the doomsaying.
sentences.chinese: 不过，这一套末世预言大可不必全信。

sentences.english: You need not flare up merely because I mentioned your work.
sentences.chinese: 你大可不必因为我提到你的工作就动怒。

definition: need not/does not have to/not necessarily
there is no need/why should
need not/not obliged to/not necessarily
to mind/to brood over/to be concerned about
man of Qǐ fears the sky falling (idiom); groundless fears
unworthy
to do more than is required (idiom); superfluous/gilding the lily
see 未可厚非[wei4 ke3 hou4 fei1]
to take a lot of trouble (over sb or sth)/may I trouble you (to do sth)
no harm (in doing it)/One might as well./It won't hurt./no matter/it's no bother
you must not/Please don't.../be sure not to/on no account (do it)
to go to war (idiom)/to make a big fuss over sth
human nature (idiom)/a behavior that is only natural
to be unavoidable (idiom)
see 犯不著|犯不着[fan4 bu5 zhao2]
hard to avoid/difficult to escape from/will inevitably
